fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A Fox Head will always spawn
- Factional chat
- Factional kill 
- Fox Omegas don't have access to the factional kill or chat, don't know who the other members of the Foxes are, and don't win with the Foxes, until they fulfill their condition to join the Foxes. The other Foxes know the roles of Fox Omegas that exist, but not players' names.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone that opposes the Foxes.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Kill anyone that opposes the Foxes.
